review: I LOVE THIS THING!  My two year old grandson has learned how it works and the voice search feature works even with his toddlers speech. He  can find his favorite toons easily. I have no complaints so far.
author: blondie

review: I was excited to receive my Amazon Fire TV in the mail.  I am stationed overseas and miss US TV programming so I was excited that this product was announced.  Set-up was simple...and then my excitement ended.  This product will not work outside the US because of copyright restrictions.  I would hold off buying this if you are outside the US until you return.  I now have a beautiful paperweight for my office and that is about all it is good for now until I am stationed back in the US.
author: J. P. F.

review: This is meant to be a brief review.If you're a Prime member, it's a no-brainer to try this.If you're a non Prime member, it's still worth checking out.Simple operation, intelligent menus, very easy setup.  Many great options.Using Plex app, our own networked content can be added & played.AF-TV playback quality is stellar.  Fluid with no stuttering or delays, just like cable or broadcast tv.Better than any similar product we've tried.

review: You can't get to your mp3's on the amazon cloud. The remote freezes up constantly and you have to take the batteries out and put them back in for it to work.  I am very disappointed, everything else I buy that is "Amazon" brand is excellent. This is completely not a typical Amazon product. I think they rushed getting it on the market.
author: Kman

review: I love this box. Its convenient, simple and quick.Box: Just about everything you need is in the box, with the exception of the HDMI cable which you can find at any Best Buy or maybe even Wal-Mart I'm not sure we had an extra lying around.Set Up: Set up was simple and easy to manageUse: This is so easy to use and intuitive. I would say it is much better for prime members than non-prime members because by default it searches the Amazon library and voice search does not work in netflix or other librarys/apps.I will clarify by saying I do NOT own any other streaming devices beyond a smart TV and blue-ray devices and a Wii but this box is heads and tails above what I do have. If you already have a prime account this box is a no-brain-er if you do not it is still a great box but I would consider purchasing an Amazon Prime account as it will improve your utilization of this devices features.I would love to see an update to the Netflix app or the box that allows us to search through all the libraries at once though I don't expect that to happen.EDIT: I now have a Roku in house and find that I still prefer my Fire TV. Especially since voice search is now recognizing hulu shows. It may be a matter of personal preference but I like my Fire and it works smoothly and simply. If you aren't looking for fancy apps and to do much more than actually watch TV I highly recommend it.
